place: Hotel Saint Christophe, La Baule (Loire-Inf√©rieure), France
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Farrar: I cabled you to stay your publication of my biography till the arrival of the enclosed corrections and suggestions for Chapters X and XI, which please pass on to Mr Gorman, I shall now look at the revised proofs of the preceding chapters (where I take it his corrections have already been made) and write you again in a few days. Sincerely yours James Joyce
